interface.name: nosetests-runner
interface.description:
This program allows you to run nosetests with a user-specific set of plugins.
use the --add-plugin and --remove-plugin option (as many times as you like) to add or remove plugin feeds. Each feed is just the URI of a zero-install nosetest plugin (see http://gfxmonk.net/dist/0install/rednose.xml for an example).
Use --list-plugins to see what plugins you current have configured.
The plugin list is stored in ~/.config/nosetests/0install-plugin-uris
